TextView.android:text:
For demonstration, you need also to run [aidl-client] project.

This project is AIDL Server. Check [aidl-client] module to get AIDL client side.

How to make AIDL file?
Right click -> New -> AIDL -> AIDL File

How to create AIDL server?
1. Create your AIDL files and implement all necessary models.
2. Build your project to generate necessary files.
3. Create your Service with AIDL as binder.
4. Declare your service in AndroidManifest.xml.

 How to create AIDL client?
1. Copy all AIDL files to AIDL client project in the same folder and implement all necessary models.
2. Build your project to generate necessary files.
3. Do bind service in your client side.
4. Declare your service in AndroidManifest.xml.
